template.name: PatientModel
template.declaration: // Patient model local variables clock patient_timer;

transition.label: Analyse_end
severe_symptoms=false, Analyse_end= false, patient_timer=0, Not_Stable=false, alert_sent=false

template.name: SensorMonitor
template.declaration: // Sensor monitor local variables clock sense_timer;

template.name: InferenceEngine
CloudAnalytics
PhysicianInterface
template.declaration: // Physician interface local variables clock response_timer;

query.formula: ====// Q3 — Alert delivery CDF via time sweep

query.comment: // Rationale: Sensor.Sensing invariant sense_timer<=30 implies timely readiness. :contentReference[oaicite:17]{index=17}

query.formula: Pr[<=MAX_INFERENCE_TIME] (<> AI.Uploading) // edge SLA under exp timing
Pr[<=MAX_CLOUD] (<> (Cloud.Predicting == false)) // cloud completes under SLA
Pr[<=600] (<> (AI.Uploading)) // how often is it *very* quick?
